text: Va heç pajomʙarero nafiristodem, magar ʙaroi in ki ʙa farmoni Alloh taolo [mardum az vaj] itoat kunand va agar hangome ki onon [ʙo gunohu nofarmonī] ʙar xeştan sitam mekardand, [to zinda hastī] nazdat meomadand va az Alloh taolo omurziş mexostand, ʙe tardid Allohro tavʙapaziri mehruʙon mejoftand
